descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
Hamlet, William Shakespeare (Folger paperback not mass market) ISBN 978-1451669411, $10
Sense and Sensibility, Jane Austen, (Penguin Classics) ISBN 978-0141439662, $7
The Sound and the Fury, William Faulkner, (Vintage Press) 978-0679732242 $15
The Feeling of What Happens, Antonio Damasio, Harcourt Press, ISBN978-0156010757, $28

descriptions.name: Class Notes
descriptions.value: ENG 385/HUM 370-5/NEUROSCI 385 may count as either an Area V (Ethics and Values) or Area VI (Lit & Fine Arts) distribution requirement. Please attend the first class for details.
